data.message: It's funny because Trump and Em were cool with each other 13 years ago. Actually, a lot of celebrities used to love Trump until he ran against a Democrat. Hell, no one accused Trump of racism until we went up against Hillary.

That’s actually NOT fake news. You can find it on YouTube. It was a skit they did together in 2004.
LMFAO if you dumbasses think this has anything to do w/supporting trump you're on crack
like i said FAKE it was on MTV 13 years ago for promoting his album
and trump is and always will be a POS deal w/it ya cry babies

I'm not saying they were smoking blunts together and chillin, but back in the day they respected each other. Trump was cool with alot of diverse celebrities and they used to go to his parties and stuff. Trump says dumb stuff I agree, and his ass needs to get off Twitter, but the fact is that all of this hate came up after Trump became a politician.
